00026 
00027 # Send a signal to the exist application (if it exists) to exit
00028 catch { send tke.tcl handle_signal }
00029 
00030 # Start a new tke session with the given arguments
00031 exec {*}$argv &
00032 
00033 # Exit
00034 exit
